QuestData.Title: Back to Eastwind Rest
QuestData.Description:
Well, far as I figure, we've got quite a lot of rebuildin' to do.
I'm not one for joining any big causes, but my farmhands aren't gonna have much to do 'round here, to be honest. And, since you helped them out, they want to join your "Horde". So, who am I to stop 'em?
Bring 'em with you, back to Farmhand Ko. I'll miss 'em, but they're better off with you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Farmhand Ko at Eastwind Rest in Kun-Lai Summit.
